metadata.title: CVE-2017-14259 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the SDK in Bento4 1.5.0-616, the AP4_StscAtom class in Ap4StscAtom.cppcontains a Write Memory Access Violation vulnerability. It is possible toexploit this vulnerability and possibly execute arbitrary code by opening acrafted .MP4 file.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
